Ilustrasi. Sejumlah restoran dan rumah makan di Jakarta telah hadir secara khusus menyajikan menu-menu vegan. (CNN Indonesia/Anggit Gita Parikesit)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Selamat Hari Vegan Sedunia! Diperingati saban tahun, 1 November menandai didirikannya The Vegan Society di Inggris pada 1944 silam. Vegan didefinisikan sebagai cara hidup yang menghindari semua bentuk eksploitasi dan kekejaman terhadap hewan, termasuk di antaranya dalam hal makanan. Kaum vegan adalah mereka yang tidak mengonsumsi makanan yang bersumber dari hewan, termasuk produk susu, madu, dan telur. Tak hanya menghindari konsumsi produk hewani, kaum vegan juga tak menjadikan garam dan bawang sebagai bahan pembuatan bumbu. Belakangan, vegan menjadi gaya hidup baru yang digandrungi banyak orang, utamanya generasi muda. Selain menghindari bentuk eksploitasi hewan, vegan juga dianggap penting untuk kesehatan tubuh. Sejumlah restoran dan rumah makan di Jakarta telah hadir dalam konsep vegan. Berikut empat rekomendasi untuk Anda yang ingin mencicipi menu makan ala vegan. 1. Burgreens Bicara soal vegan dan vegetarian, Burgreens selalu jadi rujukan. Restoran yang berdiri sejak 2013 ini menawarkan menu-menu makanan vegan yang terbuat dari tumbuhan, meski tak sepenuhnya. "Saya sendiri enggak berani mengklaim bahan-bahan di restoran 100 persen organik, tapi 70-80 persen organik," kata Helga Angeline Tjahjadi, salah satu pendiri Burgreens, saat ditemui di kawasan Jakarta Pusat, Kamis (31/10).



Meski demikian, menu-menu didesain dengan memperhatikan kandungan nutrisi yang diracik sendiri oleh Chef Max Mandias, suami Helga. Menu wajib coba adalah burger. Anda bisa mencoba Mighty Mushroom, Vegan Hotdog atau Mini Trio alias tiga buah burger mini. Di sini ada pula menu-menu yang cukup bersahabat dengan anak-anak seperti paket menu Cool Kids. Menu dibuat dengan ukuran pas untuk anak dilengkapi dengan minuman. Smoothie bowls pun siap menyegarkan dan menyehatkan tubuh seperti Pitaya Bliss Bowl, Super Nutty Protein Bowl, Burgreens Signature Bowl dan Moonlight Berry Bowl.

Recommended Vegan Cuisine in the Capital

1. Vegan Culinary Recommendations in the Capital 2. Vegan Culinary Recommendations in the Capital 3. Vegan Culinary Recommendations in the Capital


Illustration. A number of restaurants and restaurants in Jakarta have been present specifically serving vegan menus. (CNN Indonesia / Anggit Gita Parikesit)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Happy World Vegan Day! Commemorated every year, November 1 marked the founding of The Vegan Society in England in 1944. Vegan is defined as a way of life that avoids all forms of exploitation and cruelty to animals, including food. Vegans are those who do not consume foods that are sourced from animals, including dairy products, honey and eggs. Not only does it avoid the consumption of animal products, vegans also don't make salt and onions as ingredients for seasoning. Later, vegan became a new lifestyle that is loved by many people, especially the younger generation. In addition to avoiding animal exploitation, vegans are also considered important for bodily health. A number of restaurants and restaurants in Jakarta are present in the vegan concept. Here are four recommendations for those of you who want to taste the vegan-style dining menu. 1. Burgreens Speaking of vegans and vegetarians, Burgreens is always a reference. The restaurant, which was founded in 2013, offers vegan food menus made from plants, though not completely. "I myself dare not claim the ingredients in restaurants are 100 percent organic, but 70-80 percent organic," said Helga Angeline Tjahjadi, one of Burgreens founders, when met in the Central Jakarta area on Thursday (10/31).



However, the menus are designed with due regard to the nutritional content that is personally formulated by Chef Max Mandias, Helga's husband. The must-try menu is burger. You can try Mighty Mushroom, Vegan Hotdog or Mini Trio, aka three mini burgers. Here there are also menus that are quite friendly with children such as the Cool Kids menu package. Menus are made in the right size for children with drinks. Smoothie bowls are also ready to refresh and nourish the body such as the Pitaya Bliss Bowl, Super Nutty Protein Bowl, Burgreens Signature Bowl and Moonlight Berry Bowl.
